metadata.Title: CVE-2023-32558 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: The use of the deprecated API `process.binding()` can bypass the permissionmodel through path traversal. This vulnerability affects all users usingthe experimental permission model in Node.js 20.x. Please note that at thetime this CVE was issued, the permission model is an experimental featureof Node.js.

criterions.comment: nodejs package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
